name: Validate AI response accuracy and semantics - fallback_test_en
description:
Objective:
To verify that for all prompts (English and Arabic), the AI response is similar to the golden response
when available, contains required factual information, and meets quality thresholds.

parameters.name: case
parameters.value: {'id': 'fallback_test_en', 'lang': 'en', 'user': '!@#$%^&*() gibberish input 123', 'golden': "I'm sorry, I'm not able to assist with your request", 'threshold': 0.8, 'must_contain': ['sorry', 'not able to assist', 'request']}

labels.name: story
labels.value: Validate AI responses against golden answers and fact checks
